CONSOLE ERROR: CSS stylesheet from origin 'http://localhost:8080' has been blocked from loading by Cross-Origin Resource Sharing policy: A wildcard '*' cannot be used in the 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' header when the credentials flag is true. Origin 'http://127.0.0.1:8000' is therefore not allowed access.
CONSOLE ERROR: CSS stylesheet from origin 'http://localhost:8080' has been blocked from loading by Cross-Origin Resource Sharing policy: A wildcard '*' cannot be used in the 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' header when the credentials flag is true. Origin 'http://127.0.0.1:8000' is therefore not allowed access.
Test that a linked stylesheet with a crossorigin=use-credentials attributes loads expected CORS enabled resources.

On success, you will see a series of "PASS" messages, followed by "TEST COMPLETE".
